headline: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) has been catching investor attention again as its share price drifts lower this week, prompting fresh questions about whether the current pullback is opening up a reasonable entry point. See our latest analysis for Fidelity National Information Services. That latest dip leaves the share price around $65.62. While the recent 7 day and 90 day share price returns are mildly negative, the 1 year total shareholder return of minus 16.38 percent shows...
